title: Real gas approximates ideal gas as V increases

content.question: At constant temperature, the behavior of a sample of a real gas more closely approximates that of an ideal gas as its volume is increased because the

choices.label: collisions with the walls of the container become less frequent
average distance between molecules becomes greater

content.answer: average distance between molecules becomes greater

skill.text: 4.B: Explain whether a model is consistent with chemical theories.
